BBK01.WJ5011: Exchange rates on the Frankfurt exchange / ffrs 100 = DM .../ up to 1959 / France

General: Average calculated from daily quotations. From 4 May 1953 to 31 December 1959 official quotation on the Frankfurt exchange. Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 1960: ffrs 100 = NF 1 (french New Franc). Rates from 1960, see wj5012.
